title: Actor Eric Dane Passes Away After Illness
summary: Eric Dane was a famous actor who played roles in TV shows like Grey's Anatomy and Euphoria. He died at age 53 after being diagnosed with a disease called ALS, which affects how the body moves. He shared his diagnosis in April 2025 and spent his last months helping to raise money and awareness for ALS. His family said he passed away after a brave fight and was surrounded by loved ones, including his wife and two daughters. Eric was born in San Francisco and started acting in the 1990s. His co-stars from Grey's Anatomy shared kind words about him, saying he was funny and brought joy to the set. He is remembered for his work and for helping people learn about ALS.
